<h3 id="X22791">X(22791) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO EXCENTERS-MIDPOINTS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*(b+c)*a^3+(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a^2-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22791) = 5*X(1)-3*X(3655) = X(1)-3*X(3656) = 3*X(1)-X(18481) = 3*X(2)-5*X(18493) = 3*X(3)-5*X(3616) = X(3)-3*X(5603) = 3*X(3)-X(6361) = 5*X(3)-3*X(9778) = 3*X(962)+5*X(3616) = X(962)+3*X(5603) = X(962)+2*X(5901) = 3*X(962)+X(6361) = 5*X(962)+3*X(9778) = 5*X(3616)-9*X(5603) = 5*X(3616)-6*X(5901) = 5*X(3616)-X(6361) = 25*X(3616)-9*X(9778) = X(3655)-5*X(3656) = 3*X(3655)+5*X(12699) = 9*X(3655)-5*X(18481) = 3*X(3656)+X(12699) = 9*X(3656)-X(18481) = 3*X(5603)-2*X(5901) = 9*X(5603)-X(6361) = 5*X(5603)-X(9778) = 6*X(5901)-X(6361) = 10*X(5901)-3*X(9778) = 3*X(12699)+X(18481) = X(12702)-5*X(18493) = X(16118)-3*X(16159)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(10).</p>
<p>X(22791) lies on these lines:

<p>
X(22791) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 12699}, {3, 962}, {4, 1482}, {8, 8148}, {265, 7978}, {355, 7982}, {382, 944}, {2102, 10751}, {2103, 10750}, {3241, 3830}, {5758, 8158}, {5787, 7971}, {5905, 18519}, {6033, 7983}, {6259, 12650}, {6264, 16128}, {6265, 14217}, {6321, 7970}, {7728, 7984}, {7973, 14216}, {9933, 12293}, {10695, 10741}, {10696, 10747}, {10697, 10739}, {10699, 15521}, {10700, 15522}, {10703, 10740}, {10705, 12918}, {10733, 12898}, {10749, 13099}, {12626, 18507}<br>
X(22791) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3, 5901), (5, 946), (8, 18357), (40, 140), (355, 546), (1511, 11723), (3416, 18358), (3679, 5066), (4297, 15178), (5884, 6583), (9905, 22051), (9943, 13373), (10264, 12261), (12619, 16174)<br>
X(22791) = complement of X(12702)<br>
X(22791) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 79, 5434), (1, 1836, 18990), (1, 12701, 15171), (3, 5603, 5901), (4, 145, 18525), (4, 20060, 10742), (10, 946, 9955), (946, 7686, 7956), (962, 3616, 6361), (962, 5603, 3), (1482, 18525, 145), (3616, 6361, 3), (3656, 12699, 1), (5603, 6361, 3616), (12702, 18493, 2), (15170, 16137, 1)<br>
